<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Collateral Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=5867) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 84 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=5844)

</column>

---

You smack the foe you're thrashing into someone else. When you Thrash, choose another enemy adjacent to the grabbed enemy. That enemy also takes your Thrash damage, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save against your class DC.

<title level="2">Collateral Thrash leads to...</title>
[Whirlwind Toss](/Feats.aspx?ID=5876)
name: Collateral Thrash
